about_the_game:
'Dungeon Settlers' is a game that combines colony sim with dungeon crawler. Build and manage your settlement in barren land and command your clan members in real-time with pause tactical battles as they navigate the dangers of the merciless dungeon.



As the leader of an expedition clan on a dungeon quest, chosen by the Dungeon Guild, your task is to build a settlement in the wilderness and conquer the dungeon. You must feed and provide shelter for your clan members, making sure they have the right equipment and supplies. Find your way through the dungeon, facing tough decisions in critical situations, leading your members in real-time with pause combat to prevent the dungeon from turning into an irreversible disaster.

Key Features


  • Lead your dungeon expedition clan in a dark fantasy medieval world. You are the one in charge. Wisely acquire and consume resources in the loop of colony-dungeon cycles.
  • Construct houses and crafting facilities to build your colony. Unlock the research tree to further improve your base. Assign tasks to clan members to prepare the necessary equipment and supplies for dungeon expeditions.
  • Take care of clan members. Make them survive in desperate situations by fulfilling their needs and keeping their mood up. The deeper you go down, the tougher decisions you are going to confront.
  • Defeat your enemies in tactics, requiring real-time with pause combat. Overcome numerical and power disadvantages through strategic formation, party composition, skills, and understanding of damage and elemental mechanics.
  • Recruit your clan members from various races. Each race has its own characteristics and each clan member also has distinguishable personal traits.
  • Develop your clan members without class restrictions, gaining unique abilities called 'inscriptions' and skill points upon leveling up. Customize their skills from a skill tree and choose the right equipment to align with your strategic plans.
  • Delve into the dungeon to discover various artifacts, resources, interesting events and monsters, each offering new challenges and opportunities.

Construct buildings as you wish

Build walls and doors to freely construct your colony. Plan efficient colony layout by considering movement paths.

Unlock Research Tree

Unlock the research tree to craft and construct a wider variety of facilities and equipment. Remember what you choose to unlock is a part of gameplay strategy.

Manage clan members' mood

Managing the mood of clan members is essential. Failure to do so can lead to stress-induced mental breakdown and trigger lunatic behaviors.

Unique characters with different races and traits

Recruit and manage different races such as Human, Elf, Dwarf, Lizardman, WhiteDevil, and Tal. Each race has its own special features. In addition, clan members have Individual/Inscription/Physical/Experience/Soul traits that give an unique flavor to each character.

Build your character without class restriction.

Characters can be developed in various ways based on their talents, major stats, and traits. Level up to gain unique abilities known as 'inscriptions', and learn skills from skill tree and equip weapons and armors based on your strategy.

Prepare for the expeditions

Use settlement facilities to prepare equipment and supplies for dungeon expeditions. What you bring to the dungeon changes exploration and combat styles, necessitating strategic preparation.

Get advantage of elemental mechanisms

Leverage the advantages of elemental interactions in the environment, such as fire and water, to strategically guide your battles. Elements dynamically interact with each other through processes like evaporation, diffusion, and growth, offering strategic depth in combat.

Treat Injuries

Injuries can be obtained during combat and have various impacts on battles, requiring attention. Severe injuries can become permanent if not addressed promptly.

Discover Rare Resources in the Dungeon

Find essential resources in the dungeon. With luck, acquire regenerative resources to develop your base or grow your character.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or other shader model 4.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A colony sim based dungeon crawler where you manage your clan to build a settlement in barren land, provide food and shelter for your people, lead them deep into the merciless dungeon, overcome challenging combat by your strategy.
